main event: A spherical object changing colors was observed in Kankakee, Illinois, on September 22, 1955, and then disappeared.
interesting points: The object appeared very high in the northwest before disappearing in the same direction., The sighting lasted for ten minutes., The report indicated that the object possibly was seen below cloud level or at cloud level., Various conclusions were made about the object possibly being a balloon or aircraft., The sighting occurred with almost total overcast weather conditions.
